a.title: Image of Stairwell at District Office

img.alt: Image of Stairwell at District Office

div.div: What makes a school great? At West Platte, we believe it's our faculty, curriculum and the many opportunities we offer our students. West Platte promotes an environment to provide a superior educational system to prepare students to succeed in a global society. Located in beautiful Weston, Missouri, we offer a premier public education with a private school feel.

div.p:
1103 Washington Street
Weston, MO 64098
P: 816-640-2236
F: 816-386-2104
